tool_description: The USA Geo API provides functionalities for geocoding, reverse geocoding, and calculating distances between locations in the United States.
name: The USA Geo API
title: The USA Geo API

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for facilities in the US based on the facility name or search query. It returns a list of facilities with their details such as display name, latitude, longitude, address, post code, and more.

api_list.name: Directions between 2 Locations
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves directions between two locations based on their latitude and longitude coordinates using the OSRM API. It provides step-by-step instructions, distance, and duration for each step of the route.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: Unit of distance measurement (default: km). Available options: **km**, **mi**.

api_list.name: Calculate Distance - Reverse
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the distance between two locations based on their addresses using the OpenStreetMap Nominatim API and the OSRM API. The distance can be returned in different units such as kilometers (**km**), miles (**mi**), feet (**ft**), or yards (**yd**).

required_parameters.name: start_address
required_parameters.default: West Harrison Street, Chicago, United States

required_parameters.name: stop_address
required_parameters.default: East Chicago Avenue, Chicago, United States

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: Unit of distance measurement (default: **km**). Available options: **km**, **mi**, **ft**, **yd**.

api_list.name: Calculate Distance
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the distance between two locations based on their latitude and longitude coordinates. It returns the distance and duration of the route between the locations in the specified unit of measurement.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: Unit of distance measurement (default: **km**, available options: **km**, **mi**, **ft**, **yd**)

api_list.name: Geocode - Reverse
api_list.description: This endpoint performs reverse geocoding by providing latitude and longitude coordinates. It returns the address information for the specified location, including city, state, country, amenity type, and more.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the location in the US.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the location in the US.

api_list.name: Facilities Lookup
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves facilities in the US based on the provided parameters. It returns a list of facilities with their details such as display name, latitude, longitude, address, post code, and more.

api_list.name: Geocode
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to lookup locations in the United States by providing an address. It returns the latitude, longitude, and city name of the location.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The name of the address to lookup.
